title: The In Between
description: A heartbreaking story of love and loss -- perfect for fans of If I Stay and Five Feet Apart. Soon to be a motion picture starring Joey King.After bouncing around in foster homes for most of her childhood, seventeen-year-old Tessa Jacobs doesn't believe she deserves love -- not from her adoptive parents, and certainly not from anyone at school.But everything changes when she has a chance encounter with Skylar, a senior from a neighboring town who's a true romantic. Their budding relationship quickly leads to the kind of passionate love you only see in the movies. And Tessa starts to believe she might be deserving of a happy ending after all.But when tragedy strikes, Tessa wakes up alone in the hospital with no memory of how she got there. And then she learns the horrifying news: Skylar is dead. As Tessa searches relentlessly for answers, Skylar's spirit reaches out to her from the other side. Desperate to see him one last time, Tessa must race against the clock to uncover the shocking truth of their relationship -- a truth that might just lead to the afterlife itself.This heartbreaking story of first love, from screenwriter Marc Klein, will make readers believe that everyone is deserving of a happy ending.
author: Marc    Klein
